specialItems.name: Greek salad
specialItems.description: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olides and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons

specialItems.name: Bruschetta
specialItems.description: Toasted bread, topped with tomato, prosciutto, and cheese. Seasoned with salt and olive oil.

specialItems.name: Lemon Dessert
specialItems.description: Fresh baked lemon bread coated in salt and sugar. Powdered in citrus and lemon zest.
